title: cant login
body: it says everything is working but cant login

replies.body: Service Status has been updated to indicate the issue

i have the same issue. You cant even sign into the support site to submit a ticket because that is also down. A friend of mine told me to set your date on your computer back 2 days and it should work. It didnt work for me but it might for you.
